text: This morning, while I'm waiting for the last query to run, I'm looking through the old sites on the other server (mentioned yesterday) and have been looking through various archives I'm carrying with me, including the book my father wrote called MBA Toolbox. It's a responsibility I feel, and I often think I should modernize the site. It's got the look of a Manila site from the late 90s or early 00s. But it doesn't look all that bad, and he did all the work himself, so this is the way he wanted it to look.
